name: Zipline Feline
description:
You're an adventurous explorer trapped in a cat's body (aka your average domesticated feline) and your owners are away on vacation. Time to climb some furniture and cause some chaos! Use your grappling hook to climb as high as you can. Collect treasures and knock over valuables to score more points. Hang on tight though, because it looks like you started a fire and it's moving fast! And watch out for those squirt bottles which will cause you to lose your grip and fall. Bad kitty! No! Get down from there!

Points
Coins - 25pts
Big Coins - 100pts
Vases - 1000pts
Picture Frames - 2000pts

**Zipline Feline and all in-game assets (aside from a couple of free sounds) were created in 72-hours during ScoreSpace Jam #9**

CONTROLS
Use mouse to aim grappling hook. Click and hold to grapple. Swing mouse left and right to swing while hooked.

CREDITS:

SzechuanSteve- 'Purr'ogramming, Design and Sprites

Tim Przybylinski - 'Meow'sic and Sprites

Featuring Voice Acting from Jade the Cat and Guest appearance by Boba Fett the Cat
